text: 12:48 Ofa Gami 5:17; 1 Timoti 1:13Eghtɨ ingangarir gumazim an gumazir ekiam ifongezir arazibagh fozir puvatɨghɨva, egh a uabɨ mɨsoghamin arazibar amutɨ, an gumazir ekiam dughiar avɨribar a ifozoreghan kogham. Tina bar bizir avɨriba ini, a ua bizir avɨriba God danɨngam. Ezɨ tina God bizir avɨriba an dafarim garɨki, God uam a dam avɨriba inisɨva an azangsɨgham.”
